channel.title: CVE Feed for Micro Focus -- NetIQ iManager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Micro Focus -- NetIQ iManager

item.title: CVE-2022-38758|2024-08-03T11:02:14.473Z -- micro%20focus -- netiq%20imanager
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in NetIQ iManager prior to version 3.2.6 allows attacker to execute malicious scripts on the user's browser. This issue affects: Micro Focus NetIQ iManager NetIQ iManager versions prior to 3.2.6 on ALL.
